text: Abramovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Bolshekochinskoye Rural Settlement of Kochyovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 20 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The village is located 24 km from Kochevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kochyovsky District
title: Abramovka, Perm Krai
